snippet: The package, intercepted by security officers in October, would be an anomaly, an assassination attempt using biological weapons and not a suicide or bomb attack.
abstract: Official says Pakistan’s Prime Min Yousaf Raza Gilani received a postal package containing anthrax spores four months ago, adding a new dimension to the security threats faced by the country’s political and military leadership; package was intercepted by security officers.
lead_paragraph: The package, intercepted by security officers in October, would be an anomaly, an assassination attempt using biological weapons and not a suicide or bomb attack.

headline.seo: Pakistan Reveals Prime Minister Gilani Was Sent Anthrax
headline.main: Pakistan Says Prime Minister Was Mailed Anthrax Spores
headline.print_headline: Pakistan Says Prime Minister Was Mailed Anthrax Spores
